items.sentence: Tom learned how to do that from his grandfather.
Tom left the house while we were still sleeping.
Why is the car in front of us driving so slowly?
Why should Tom insist that Mary do that for him?
Why would Tom want to go do something like that?
With a little help, I should be able to do this.
I don\'t think most of us could do what Tom did.
I don\'t think that Tom will want to go with us.
I don\'t think this is the right way to do this.
Tom hasn\'t been told he shouldn\'t do that yet.
